Reference

Dynamic chamber measurements

process_chamber() process_losgatos() process_gasmet()

Calculate gasfluxes from dynamic chamber measurement

read_gasmet()

Read a GASMET file.

read_losgatos()

Read a LosGatos file.

inspect_gasmet() inspect_losgatos()

Show plots for every measurement

gals()

Gas analyzer setup

gals_gasmet()

GASMET setup

gals_losgatos()

LosGatos setup

BLE

calc_SN()

Calculate Schmidt Number

calc_k600()

Calculate k600

calc_kW()

Calculate Gas transfer coefficient

calc_kH()

Calculate Henry's constant

Helper functions

trim_time()

Functions to modify interval between start and end of chamber deployment

day2sec() sec2day()

Convert flux units

axis.flux.co2() axis.flux.gas() axis.flux.ch4()

Label axis for CO2 according to flux scale.

Data

gasmet

GASMET Flux measurement with three entries.

losgatos

LosGatos Flux measurement with three entries.

meta_gasmet

Metafile for GASMET measurement.

meta_losgatos

Metafile for LosGatos measurement.
